title: Help ;_;
body:
Hey There Summoners 
i am new in league of legends
and i heard about hextech crafting
and that they will give me a box in level 5 right ?
i am level 5 why i didn't get a free chest to open ?

replies.body:
Sometimes it can take a bit for the new player chest to arrive!  Usually a relog or waiting about a day will get the package delivered.  I'm glad all is well now!  Welcome to league, and best of luck on the fields of justice!  
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
